Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a breathtaking 58 off 26 balls
Matheesha Pathirana was the pick of the bowlers for the hosts with figures of 4/40 in four overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India beat Sri Lanka by 43 runs in the first T20I of the three-match series on Saturday, July 27 at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Pallekele
Sri Lanka got all out for 170 in 19.2 overs
Others: Pathum Nissanka top-scored with his sensational innings of 79 (48)
Arshdeep Singh (2/24, 3 overs), Axar Patel (2/38) picked two wickets each
Kusal Mendis added 84 runs for the first wicket off 52 balls with Pathum Nissanka
Riyan Parag was the pick of the bowlers with figures of 3/5 in 1.2 overs
Kamindu Mendis continued to show positive intent smashing consecutive boundaries against Ravi Bishnoi
Captain Suryakumar Yadav continued the onslaught, registering his second fastest half century off just 22 balls
Rishabh Pant finally got a move on by dispatching two full tosses from Asitha Fernando for a six and a four to move from 20 (23) to 32* (25)
Hardik Pandya (9 off 10) and Riyan Parag (7 off 6) got dismissed cheaply trying to up the ante in the death overs
Axar Patel finished the Indian innings in style, hitting Asitha Fernando over his head for a maximum
